front.title: Use of Internationalized Email Addresses in EPP protocol

abstract.t: This document permits usage of Internationalized Email Addresses in the EPP protocol. The Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP), being developed before appearing the standards for Internationalized Email Addresses (EAI), does not support such email addressed. This document describes an EPP extension that allows EAI addresses to be used in contact mapping in the EPP protocol.
